entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 30 December 2022
